name: cherry madness
description:
Short(very short) fast-paced platformer game for 130 Mini Jam

Collect cherries or you will die in 10 seconds. Game currently fully without sounds. Only 6 levels available(there will be more after the jam). Currently there is no save system, but there will be in the next update.

Assets and font from asset pack by Pixel Frog.  

If have any problems while playing please report in comments and I will try to fix them.

third level can be beaten without melons btw =)

updates:

-ver 0.2: added 2 levels
